did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Scrapbook documenting visit of Mikhail Gorbachev at Stanford on June 4, 1990.
did.physloc: Special Collections and University Archives materials are stored offsite and must be paged 36-48 hours in advance. For more information on paging collections, see the department's website: http://library.stanford.edu/spc.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94305-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/spc/using-collections/permission-publish.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [identification of item], Gorbachev at Stanford scrapbook (A0123). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical note
bioghist.p: Mikhail Sergeyevich Gorbachev was born March 2, 1931. He served as General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union from 1985 until 1991, and as the country's head of state from 1988 until its dissolution in 1991 (titled as Chairman of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet from 1988 to 1990 and President of the Soviet Union from 1990 to 1991). On June 4 he visited the Stanford campus and gave an address at Memorial Auditorium.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook documenting visit of Mikhail Gorbachev at Stanford on June 4, 1990. Album presented to Donald Kennedy on his tenth anniversary as President of Stanford University from the Stanford Board of Trustees and his staff on October 8, 1990. Scrapbook album contains official event program, newspaper clippings from Stanford newspapers as well as other Bay Area and national papers, photographs of the event, a commemorative USPS postal envelope, and letters from George P. Shultz.
